summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Settings page (Business Info & Points System) and Sales History coupon tracking. All major features implemented and functional.

minor_issues.issue: business_logo field initially missing from response when null/empty
minor_issues.impact: Minor - field exists but may be null

minor_issues.issue: Some input field selectors had intermittent detection issues during automated testing
minor_issues.note: Functionality works correctly, only test selector specificity issue

passed_tests: Business Info fields (name, address, phone, logo) - all editable
Save Settings button with success message
Customer model points fields (total_spent, points_balance, points_earned, points_redeemed)
GET /api/customers/{id} returns points_info with all required fields
Sales model points integration (points_used, points_discount, points_earned)
Sales History page navigation and display
Sales History Coupon column present and functional
Coupon API endpoints (create, validate, update, delete)
